snippet: Outfielder Jackie Bradley Jr., who had a dazzling spring but had been expected to start the season in the minors, drew three walks and scored twice in a victory over the Yankees.
abstract: Boston Red Sox outfielder Jackie Bradley Jr, who was expected to start season in minors, exhibits top-notch performance in season-opening victory over New York Yankees.
lead_paragraph: Outfielder Jackie Bradley Jr., who had a dazzling spring but had been expected to start the season in the minors, drew three walks and scored twice in a victory over the Yankees.

headline.seo: Red Sox’ Jackie Bradley Jr. Makes Strong Debut
headline.main: Red Sox Phenom Arrives Before His Time, as Good as Hoped
headline.print_headline: Red Sox Phenom Arrives Before His Time, as Good as Hoped
